price: N’uwo ari we wese muri bo (abamalayika) wavuga ati “Mu by’ukuri njye ndi imana mu cyimbo cye (Allah)”; uwo twazamuhanisha umuriro wa Jahanamu. Kandi uko ni ko duhemba inkozi z’ibibi.
arabic: ۞ وَمَن يَقُلۡ مِنۡهُمۡ إِنِّيٓ إِلَٰهٞ مِّن دُونِهِۦ فَذَٰلِكَ نَجۡزِيهِ جَهَنَّمَۚ كَذَٰلِكَ نَجۡزِي ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: waman yaqul min'hum innī ilāhun min dūnihi fadhālika najzīhi jahannama kadhālika najzī al-ẓālimīna
